Class DataSchema

extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the rows and columns that are to be imported

    • Method Detail

      • getDataSchema

        public static DataSchema getDataSchema(java.lang.String input)
        Converts a string into a schema of rows/column indexes to be read in (e.g. "3,4,6-12" becomes [3,4,6,7,8,9,10,11,12])

      • getSchema

        public int[] getSchema()
        Returns:
        the columns/rows that are to be read from

      • getCutOff

        public int getCutOff()
        Returns:
        the cutoff from where all following rows/columns are to be read (-1 if there is no cut-off)

      • isInOrder

        public boolean isInOrder()
        Returns:
        true if the elememts in the schema are in order (i.e. 5 does not come after 10).
